def gc_content(seq):
    return 100.0 * len([c for c in seq if c in 'GC']) / len(seq)
yy = [gc_content(record.seq[i:i + window_size]) for i in range(len(record.
    seq) - window_size)]
xx = np.arange(len(record.seq) - window_size) + 25
ax.fill_between(xx, yy, alpha=0.3)
ax.set_ylabel('GC(%)')
